name: I have no nose, and I must smell
name_original: I have no nose, and I must smell
description:
If you give everything to delay the inevitable, you may very well come to regret it.

Come play our Outer Wilds-inspired StRaNd-type game! We’ve got:

  • A small solar system of planets filled with mystery and “mostly” finished models.
  • A fanciful new race called ‘Fragrans’, a people with two noses
  • A story that will leave you questioning everything
  • Handcrafted original soundtrack brimming with emotion
  • Hairy toroids, full of life!
  • Wacky physics and an even wackier control scheme!
  • “TBH I’m kinda stoked we got this far in a game jam, looks sick.” -Enad
  • “someone left the dune cgi out in the sun too long and it melted” -Gorgan (5 stars)

Footnotes:

- HTML5 version working but using GLES2 so it is slightly more ugly.

- Sometimes you might clip through geometry. We really did try our best, but Godot's physics is a finnicky beast.

- Hint: to win you must successfully ~log in~. Discover the lore to find out how!

Version History:

- v1.1 Bugfix [2022/04/05]: Fixed text logs not showing. Now 100% more lore as a result!
